Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:03:49
Folder: CEQ5J54 - humanitarian support for lebanon creating impact together
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CEQ5J54_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-15 10:43
Subject: Humanitarian Support for Lebanon | Creating Impact Together
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/3cqxfAEJKEyETDlXyE2bmw/548336/C8C26E760B96984C398320646D0CED30/microsoftteams-image-923.png> 	
As we continue to witness the challenging and distressing events unfolding in our region, with thousands of innocent lives lost and even more displaced, it is crucial that we come together as a community. We extend our deepest sympathy and condolences to all those impacted.

Our Group has worked closely with local and international NGOs, including Red Cross Lebanon, World Food Program, Arcenciel, Handicap International and Better Shelter, to provide essential support such as ambulance services & medicine for 7,750 people, clothing for 2,500 people, medical supplies for 2,500 people, shelter for 1500 people, overall aiding over 14,000 people and donating more than 450,000 meals. Alongside these efforts, we are dedicated to providing ongoing support to those affected in Gaza.

chunks.text:
Our Group has worked closely with local and international NGOs, including Red Cross Lebanon, World Food Program, Arcenciel, Handicap International and Better Shelter, to provide essential support such as ambulance services & medicine for 7,750 people, clothing for 2,500 people, medical supplies for 2,500 people, shelter for 1500 people, overall aiding over 14,000 people and donating more than 450,000 meals. Alongside these efforts, we are dedicated to providing ongoing support to those affected in Gaza.

As a Group, we have also partnered with various NGOs, as aligned with authorities across our region to send donations to Lebanon, through humanitarian aid, whether monetary or in-kind donations.

Let us continue creating impact together during these difficult times.

We hope for peace in our region and the world.


See how you can also create an impact below (UAE only)


We have partnered with Emirates Red Crescent to support the people of Lebanon.

For monetary donations, you can donate in the link below and the amount will be deducted from your salary.

The Group will offer donations and will match those made by our team members.

chunks.text:
Please note that only new items will be accepted. ERC are not accepting pre-loved items.

We can only accept the following items:
Women Basket: Soap, shampoo, tooth brush, tooth paste, sanitary napkins, towels, body cream, hand sanitizer, razor, blankets
Baby Basket: Soap, tooth brush, tooth paste, diapers, baby shampoo, baby food (cerelac), baby feeding bottle, baby milk powder, baby cream, towels, blankets, glucose biscuit
Shelter Items: Blankets, towels, socks, jackets and slipper for kids, socks, jackets and slipper for adults.
Food Basket: Dates, tuna cans, canned chickpeas, canned fava beans, canned hummus, canned sweet corn, canned green peas, oil, wheat, salt, tea, glucose biscuit, sugar, spices.


IMPORTANT NOTE

This event is licensed by Islamic Affairs and Charitable Activities Department

All funds and in-kind items are being sent through the Emirates Red Crescent (a Non-Governmental Organisation) PRHCE-003544238 and PRHCE-003543394.

This is an internal initiative for Dubai based team members. For those in Abu Dhabi that want to contribute, please reach out to impact@chalhoub.com.

We are working closely with NGOs across the region, keep a look out on how you can support soon.

For inquiries, please get in touch with us at Internal.Communications@chalhoub.com and to share your news in the Internal News please contact Yasmine.Uthman@chalhoub.com

Copyright © 2023 Chalhoub Group, all rights reserved.

You are receiving this email because your are a part of the Chalhoub Group.
